short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restrict copy-paste from NetSuite to external applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NS Copyright is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance data security and streamline workflow for users of NetSuite. Developed with privacy and user productivity in mind, this extension restricts the copying of sensitive information from NetSuite to external applications such as Word or Excel while ensuring that internal NetSuite operations remain unaffected.

Key Features:

Copy Protection: Automatically replaces copied content with "Content Privacy" when attempting to paste outside of NetSuite.
Internal Pasting: Seamlessly restores the original copied text when pasting between NetSuite tabs, ensuring smooth workflow within the NetSuite ecosystem.
Right-Click Customization: Blocks unnecessary right-click options, such as "Print" and "Search on Google," while retaining essential options like "Open in New Tab" and "Open in New Window."
Privacy-First: Protects your organization's sensitive data from accidental or intentional exposure to external applications.

NS Copyright is an ideal solution for companies using NetSuite who want to prevent data leaks while ensuring that internal operations remain efficient and uninterrupted.
